name: Village Guardians
description:
This game is a battle RPG which engages monsters, upgrading guardians.

  • Goal
    It is completion to defend the village in 30 days.

  • Shop
    The products offered of a shop change by days.

  • Scout
    It informs you of next monsters. It can do any times.

  • Battle
    Battle is automatic progress. If you have healing items, it will be used automatically.
    If in the middle of the battle, it will recover by an expensive item, and once a battle finishes, it will recover to 80 percent of HP by a cheap item.
